name: untitled project (violet)
description:
after a month of doing a bunch of programming i dont care about for class i decided i needed to make something i actually wanted to. im going to build a full room including all of its subrooms (including textures, sprites, events, maybe even sound). if i like it enough i'll make more rooms and connect them and stick them here too.

you play as tv head, a weird little entity made of static and royalty free television images. you will find other characters such as Cat, a thing made of polygons and meat that seems to think its a cat (COMING SOON) and a whole entire (not yet) room to explore.

expect a quirky mixed-media artstyle, surreal environments and a lot of walking around. so far it's  mostly a yume nikki-like with a unique 3D twist. also, this is VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT: DEFAULT RPG MAKER TEXTURES ARE PLACEHOLDERS
